snippet.title: Halloween Forever - 8-bit Halloween Adventure Platformer trailer
snippet.description:
Get Halloween Forever for pc and mac! http://imaginarymonsters.itch.io/halloween-forever

Halloween Forever is a retro 8-bit Halloween adventure platformer. Something mysterious is happening in the pumpkin patch this Halloween! You control Pumpkin Man, a humanoid pumpkin thing animated by occult forces on a quest to discover why things are so creepy. And you vomit candy corn.

Adventure through three weird, spooky worlds in search of your destiny. Meet chainsaw maniacs, undead sorcerers, spooky bats, and lots of skeletons on your way. Can you survive the horrors that await you within these spooky tombs?
